can_add_users.long_description: Users with this permission can add other users to the website.

can_submit_others_work.long_description: Users with this permission can submit work to an assignment for other users. This means they can submit work that will have another user as the author.

can_submit_own_work.long_description: Users with this permission can submit their work to assignments of this course. Usually only students have this permission.

can_edit_others_work.long_description: Users with this permission can edit files in the submissions of this course. Usually TAs and teachers have this permission, so they can change files in the CodeGra.de filesystem if code doesn't compile, for example.

can_grade_work.long_description: Users with this permission can grade submissions.

can_see_grade_before_open.long_description: Users with this permission can see the grade for a submission before an assignment is set to "done".

can_see_others_work.long_description: Users with this permission can see submissions of other users of this course.

can_see_assignments.long_description: Users with this permission can view the assignments of this course.

can_see_hidden_assignments.long_description: Users with this permission can view assignments of this course that are set to "hidden".

can_use_snippets.long_description: Users with this permission can use the snippets feature on the website.

can_edit_own_info.long_description: Users with this permission can edit their own personal information.

can_edit_own_password.long_description: Users with this permission can edit their own password.

can_use_linter.long_description: Users with this permission can run linters on all submissions of an assignment.

can_edit_assignment_info.long_description: Users with this permission can update the assignment info such as name, deadline and status.

can_assign_graders.long_description: Users with this permission can assign a grader to submissions of assignments.

can_edit_cgignore.long_description: Users with this permission can edit the .cgignore file for an assignment.

can_upload_bb_zip.long_description: Users with this permission can upload a zip file with submissions in the BlackBoard format.

can_edit_course_roles.long_description: Users with this permission can assign or remove permissions from course roles and add new course roles.
can_edit_course_roles.warning: With this permission a user can change all permissions for everyone in this course. Users can not remove this permission from themselves.

can_edit_course_users.long_description: Users with this permission can add users to this course and assign roles to those users.

can_create_assignment.long_description: Users with this permission can create new assignments for this course.

can_upload_after_deadline.long_description: Users with this permission can submit their work after the deadline of an assignment.

can_create_courses.long_description: Users with this permission can create new courses.

can_see_assignee.long_description: Users with this permission can see who is assigned to assess a submission.

manage_rubrics.long_description: Users with this permission can update the rubrics for the assignments of this course.

can_view_own_teacher_files.long_description: Users with this permission can view the teacher's revision of their submitted work.

can_see_grade_history.long_description: Users with this permission can see the grade history of an assignment.

can_delete_submission.long_description: Users with this permission can delete submissions.

can_manage_site_users.long_description: Users with this permission can change the global permissions for other users on the site.

can_update_grader_status.long_description: Users with this permission can change the status of graders for this course, whether they are done grading their assigned submissions or not.

can_update_course_notifications.long_description: Users with this permission can change the all notifications that are configured for this course. This includes when to send them and who to send them to.

can_search_users.long_description: Users with this permission can search for users on the side, this means they can see all other users on the site.

can_edit_maximum_grade.long_description: Users with this permission can edit the maximum grade possible, and therefore also determine if getting a 'bonus' for an assignment is also possible.

can_view_plagiarism.long_description: Users with this permission can view the summary of a plagiarism check and see details of a plagiarism case. To view a plagiarism case between this and another course, the user must also have either this permission, or both "See assignments" and "See other's work" in the other course.
can_view_plagiarism.warning: This permission also implies the "See assignments" and "See other's work" permissions in this course.

can_manage_plagiarism.long_description: Users with this permission can add and delete plagiarism runs.

can_list_course_users.long_description: Users with this permission can see all users of this course including the name of their role.

can_edit_own_groups.long_description: Users with this permission can edit groups they are in. This means they can join groups, add users to groups they are in and change the name of groups they are in. They cannot remove users from groups they are in, except for themselves.

can_edit_others_groups.long_description: Users with this permission can edit groups they are not in, they can add users, remove users and rename all groups. Users with this permission can also edit groups they are in.

can_edit_groups_after_submission.long_description: Users with this permission can edit groups which handed in a submission. Users with this permission cannot automatically edit groups, they also need either "Edit own groups" or "Edit others groups".

can_view_others_groups.long_description: Users with this permission can view groups they are not in, and the members of these groups.

can_edit_group_assignment.long_description: Users with this permission can change an assignment into a group assignment, and change the minimum and maximum required group size.

can_edit_group_set.long_description: Users with this permissions can create, delete and edit group sets.

can_create_groups.long_description: Users with this permission can create new groups in group assignments.

can_view_course_snippets.long_description: Users with this permission can see the snippets of this course, and use them while writing feedback.

can_manage_course_snippets.long_description: Users with this permission can create, edit, and delete snippets for this course.
